content: सेव् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (सेवते, सेवित; {%<ab>caus.</ab>%} सेवयति-ते; {%<ab>desid.</ab>%} सिसेविषते; the स् of सेव् is generally changed to ष् after prepositions ending in इ such as नि, परि, वि) {@--1@} To serve, wait or attend upon, honour, worship, obey; प्रायो भृत्यास्त्यजंति प्रचलितविभवं स्वामि नं सेवमानाः <ls>Mu. 4. 21</ls>; आचारपूतं पवनः सिषेवे <ls>R. 2. 13</ls> ‘served or refreshed’; ऐश्वर्यादनपेतमीश्वरमयं लोकोर्थतः सेवते <ls n="R.">1. 14.</ls> {@--2@} To go after, pursue, follow. {@--3@} To use, enjoy; किं सेव्यते सुमनसां मनसापि गंधः कस्तूरिकाजननशक्तिभृता मृगेण <ls>R. G.</ls> {@--4@} To enjoy carnally; केतकीं सेवसे हंत कथं रोलंब निस्त्रपः <ls>Bv. 1. 118.</ls> {@--5@} To attach or devote oneself to, attend to, cultivate, practise, perform; <ls>Ms. 2. 1</ls>; <ls>Ku. 5. 38</ls>, <ls>R. 17. 49.</ls> {@--6@} To resort to, betake oneself to, dwell in, frequent, inhabit; तप्तं वारि विहाय तीरनलिनीं कारंडवः सेवते <ls>V. 2. 23</ls>, <ls>Pt. 1. 9.</ls> {@--7@} To watch over, guard, protect.
